verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hiki ndicho kizazi cha
wakutafutao ee Mungu wetu. x2
Cha wakutafutao uso wako
ee Mungu wa Yakobo,
(hiki ndicho), x2
kizazi cha wakutafutao Mungu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana ulinijua
tangu tumbo-ni,
wewe unayajua
maneno ya-ngu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mchana na usiku
umekuwa kinga,
ee Mungu Mungu
wangu nitakusifu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nitakusifu mimi siku
zote ee Mungu,
unibariki Bwana daima milele.
